EmailTemplate.name: RE: Thank You for Your Interest in MBO Partners (1326748284.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: Thank You for Your Interest in MBO Partners (1326748284.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
1024x768 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Ruth,
You are very welcome. I actually will need to forward your information over to an account manager that works specifically with Booz Allen but I will see if they are available at the same time that you scheduled the call with me. If not I will have them reach out directly and reschedule.
Thank you for reaching out and have a great evening, Nicolette
___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Consultant Services Advisor MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6281 f: 703.793.6456 e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
From: Ruth Futrovsky [mailto:futrovsky@gmail.com] Sent: Monday, January 16, 2012 4:09 PM To: Nicolette Taylor Subject: Re: Thank You for Your Interest in MBO Partners
Hi, Nicolette.
Thank you for reaching out. I used the link to schedule a call for tomorrow at 1:00 pm.
As background, I am currently employed with Booz Allen, but my position will end at the end of this month. My manager let me know that they are interested in having me work in almost the same capacity as a contractor. They suggested that I work through MBO and it looks like a good solution.
I look forward to speaking with you tomorrow.
Thank you, Ruth
On Mon, Jan 16, 2012 at 3:54 PM, Nicolette Taylor <ntaylor@mbopartners.com> wrote:
Dear Ruth,
Thank you for taking the time to contact MBO Partners. My name is Nicolette Taylor, an MBO Partners Enrollment Manager, and I will reach out to you within one business day.
If you prefer, you can easily schedule a phone appointment with me by visiting https://my.timedriver.com/9TGRK.
I look forward to speaking with you!
Best regards, Nicolette ___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Enrollment Manager MBO Partners
t: (703) 793-6281 f: 703.793.6070 e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
Error! Filename not specified. Error! Filename not specified.
-- Ruth Futrovsky
